description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is looking for a contractor to provide Task and Solutions Professional Services. The contractor will be responsible for providing one (1) 3.2 Senior (Level 3) Project Manager and one (1) 3.4 Intermediate (Level 2) Project Planner to assist in the developing the Sustainment Business Case Analysis (SBCA) for the Arctic Offshore Patrol Ship (AOPS) and Joint Support Ship (JSS) In Service Support (AJISS) Contract.
full_summary:
=========================
## PROJECT MANAGER AND PROJECT PLANNER SERVICES

### Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01003563
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-230507/A
**Publication Date:** August 8, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 7, 2022 2:00 PM ET

The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to engage the services of a supplier to provide Task and Solutions Professional Services. This requirement is for the development of the Sustainment Business Case Analysis (SBCA) for the Arctic Offshore Patrol Ship (AOPS) and Joint Support Ship (JSS) In-Service Support (AJISS) Contract.

### Requirements

*   One (1) 3.2 Senior (Level 3) Project Manager
*   One (1) 3.4 Intermediate (Level 2) Project Planner

The selected supplier will be required to provide resources to assist in the development of the SBCA. The estimated level of effort for the initial contract period is 480 days, with the option to extend for three additional periods of one year each.

### Security Requirements

*   Company minimum security level: Secret
*   Resource minimum security level: Secret
*   Document safeguarding security level: Protected B

### Applicable Trade Agreements

The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

Guindon, Daniel
DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca
National Defence Headquarters, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

### How to Submit a Proposal

Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are interested in submitting a proposal should contact the contracting authority to request an invitation to bid. The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to
